about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamed of creating your dream home? I bet you do. Look no further since this game exactly does what you want i.e. building your dream home without the monetary investments and other hassles of real life.

Use hundreds of objects and arrange them exactly as you'd like your house to be while listening to a relaxing soundtrack. Once you are happy with the design feel free to share with the community.

Some of the features of this game are :-

  • Design Freedom - Design your own layout. We give you complete freedom to layout your rooms.
  • Furnishing - Place furniture and different objects from the library to furnish the rooms.
  • Painting - Paint the walls , Color the furniture as you see fit.
  • Sharing - Once you are happy with the layout you can share the rooms with the community, friends and family.
  • Customization - You can customize the weather , ambient color and many more in the game.

name: My Cozy Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB dedicated VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10,11 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: My Cozy Home is a relaxing house building game where you get to build the house you always dreamed of. The game offers a huge library of items to create a bedroom or a kitchen or a gaming room or anything you can dream of. Choice is yours. Add to Wishlist now!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, French, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
